thread.section_title: Sunday Afternoons Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sunday Afternoons | www.sundayafternoons.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Ron

author: Ron
title: Ron
text: The purchase process at Sunday Afternoons was a piece of cake. They had originally sent the wrong hat but quickly made it right by shipping the new hat at no expense to me. The hat I received, a trucker, is an adjustable, one size fits all type of hat, and I have to say the hat is quite large. Even when I suggested to properly fit my head there is a lot of extra material gathered at the back of the hat. I've had several adjustable hats previously, and they seem to fit a little better than this one.
